events.name: GDG Ranchi Launch Event

venue.name: SUBWAY in JD Hi Street
venue.address_1: Opposite GEL Church Complex, Shop No.502
venue.address_2: JD Hi  Street Mall, Mahatma Gandhi Main Rd, Hindpiri

events.description:
Join us for our Launch Event !!
Here we will interact with each other and get the community running. We will also disclose our upcoming Events and what to expect.

Agenda:
1. Introduction
2. Open Source, Git and Google's product.
3. What are your expectations from GDG Ranchi?
4. Wrap-up

events.name: Flutter Live: GDG Ranchi
events.description:
We’re holding a global party for Flutter, and we’d love you to be part of the celebration!

GDG Ranchi will celebrate Flutter and inspire you to adopt Flutter by watching the Keynote of Flutter Live(https://developers.google.com/events/flutter-live/)

Flutter is a developer SDK that makes it easy and fast to build high-performance, modern, beautiful apps for both iOS and Android. Flutter is an open-source toolkit from Google and over 100 contributors from the open-source community.

Learn more at https://flutter.io

Agenda:
* Introduction
* What is Flutter?
* watching Flutter Live video, ( recorded )
* Building Beautiful UIs with Flutter (Codelab)[https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/flutter/index.html?index=..%2F..%2Findex#0]
* App UI submission

Required:
* Laptop ( Android studio on it), if it's not installed, please visit https://developer.android.com/studio/install and try to install. We will help you at the event but better come prepared.

Social media:
Please use #FlutterLive @flutterio on twitter while attending thisevent.
events.how_to_find_us: At Harmu Chowk look for Digital Vidya Banner

events.name: Flutter Study Jams [Part 1] - GDG Ranchi
events.description:
[NOTE] Please make sure that this is going to be a series of events where you have to be present in all the subsequent event of the Studyjam. If you feel you will not be able to make it for the event kindly DO NOT RSVPED yourself.

Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join GDG Ranchi for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll learn from Flutter Udacity Course prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals.

This event is going to happen on YouTube Live!

events.name: Flutter Study Jams [Part 2] - GDG Ranchi

venue.name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee Innovation Lab ( ABVIL )
venue.address_2: New Police Line, Opposite Chief Minister Sachiwalaya

events.description:
NOTE] Please make sure that this is going to be a series of events where you have to be present in all the subsequent event of the Studyjam. If you feel you will not be able to make it for the event kindly DO NOT RSVPED yourself.

Please watch this video before joining this event: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uTAR90h4sa4

Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join GDG Ranchi for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll learn from Flutter Udacity Course prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals.

Bring your laptop and your mobile phone!

For the best experience, the laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time.
Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine. Check out: https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

If you have any problems installing flutter do let us know by sending a message to us.

Speakers
* Md Shahbaz Alam
GDG Ranchi Organiser
* +2 more speakers from Google commnity ( Once finalized, will update this space )

Google form: https://goo.gl/forms/Ewl3V6A4TDcE2SWA2
Flutter Udacity Course: https://in.udacity.com/course/build-native-mobile-apps-with-flutter--ud905
Flutter Codelabs: https://codelabs.developers.google.com/?cat=Flutter
Flutter Docs: https://flutter.io/docs

GDG Ranchi
Meetup Page: https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Ranchi/
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/gdgrnc
Twitter: http://twitter.com/gdgrnc/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gdgrnc/

events.name: Flutter Study Jams [Part 3] - GDG Ranchi
events.description:
Note: This is the final event to our Flutter Study Jam, here you'll be asked to submit your proof of course completion and work done.

Only RSVPed this event, when you want to attend the previous two events of this series.
Flutter Study Jams [Part 1] - GDG Ranchi - https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Ranchi/events/257871585/
Flutter Study Jams [Part 2] - GDG Ranchi - https://www.meetup.com/GDG-Ranchi/events/257872173/

Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join GDG Ranchi for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll learn from Flutter Udacity Course prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals.

events.name: GDG Ranchi - Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.

Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

events.name: Introduction to Vue.js

venue.name: Excellence Academy of Computer Education
venue.address_1: 2203, Amrud Bagan, Kumhar Toli, Ratu Road

events.description:
Vue (pronounced /vjuː/, like view) is a progressive framework for building user interfaces. Unlike other monolithic frameworks, Vue is designed from the ground up to be incrementally adoptable. The core library is focused on the view layer only and is easy to pick up and integrate with other libraries or existing projects. On the other hand, Vue is also perfectly capable of powering sophisticated Single-Page Applications when used in combination with modern tooling and supporting libraries.

Agenda:
* Introduction
* Basics of Vue
* Advantages of Vue
* Applications & Demo
* Hands-on
* Conclusion

Speaker:
Tanweer Anwar, he is a computer science students who use Vue for his projects and loves teaching about the same.

Venue: https://goo.gl/maps/GjvyHPXYorm
